ass_menu_is_massive_desc: Make the mod do the thing.
ass_menu_level_mod_desc: Make levels use a fixed response faction on any difficulty. Disabled in Holdout. ZEAL Level Mods activate an additional matchmaking lock.
ass_menu_assault_style_desc: Choose which set of spawn groups to face.
ass_menu_skill_desc: Tweaks base values used for scaling.
ass_menu_doms_scale_desc: All dominatable enemies are better at resisting domination on higher difficulties.
ass_menu_doms_all_hard_desc: All dominatable enemies are as adept at resisting domination as a heavy unit.
ass_menu_doms_super_serious_desc: All dominatable enemies will only give up between assault waves. Effectively always active in Super Serious Shooter.
ass_menu_max_values_desc: Sets values that scale with chosen difficulty to use Death Sentence values.
ass_menu_max_diff_desc: Always uses task data corresponding to 100% heist difficulty progression.
ass_menu_max_balance_muls_desc: Always uses enemy spawn limits corresponding to a full crew, regardless of how many players there are.
ass_menu_dmg_interval_desc: Tweak the grace period duration for yourself only. Has no effect in Super Serious Shooter.
ass_menu_shield_arms_desc: Determine the weapon type used by Shield units. Has no effect in Super Serious Shooter.
ass_menu_taser_dazers_desc: Determine the weapon type used by Tasers.
ass_menu_cloaker_balance_desc: Determine the weapon type used by Cloakers.
ass_menu_medic_ordnance_desc: Determine the weapon type used by rifle Medics.
ass_menu_medical_ordinance_desc: Determine the weapon type used by shotgun Medics. Yes, those are two different words.
ass_menu_smg_units_desc: Allow SMG SWATs for supported factions to spawn in the assault, if available.
ass_menu_minigun_dozers_desc: Allow Minigun Dozers to spawn in the assault on Death Wish difficulty.
ass_menu_captain_winters_desc: Allow Captain Winters to spawn. Effectively always inactive in Super Serious Shooter.
ass_menu_gas_grenade_ignore_hostages_des: Allow police to deploy gas grenades even when hostages are in the area.
ass_menu_reset_settings_desc: Reset settings to the default for the next heist.
ass_menu_reset_settings_verify: Sure you wanna reset your settings?
ass_menu_sh_not_found:
Alarmingly Streamlined Spawngroups requires Streamlined Heisting.

Alarmingly Streamlined Spawngroups will deactivate itself until Streamlined Heisting is installed and the game is fully restarted.
ass_menu_sh_disabled:
Alarmingly Streamlined Spawngroups requires Streamlined Heisting to be enabled.

Alarmingly Streamlined Spawngroups will deactivate itself until Streamlined Heisting is reenabled and the game is fully restarted.
ass_menu_sh_outdated:
Alarmingly Streamlined Spawngroups requires a newer version of Streamlined Heisting.

Alarmingly Streamlined Spawngroups will deactivate itself until Streamlined Heisting is updated and the game is fully restarted.
ass_menu_zeal_matchmaking_locked:
The ZEAL Level Mods in Alarmingly Streamlined Spawngroups require an additional matchmaking lock due to technical reasons.

You will only be able to play with others who also have the mod set to use a ZEAL Level Mod.

To remove this matchmaking lock, change your Level Mod setting to one without ZEALs and fully restart your game.
